jobs_results.title: Ethereum Blockchain Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
Company Overview:
Ex Populus is a cutting-edge gaming and entertainment startup focused on building the Metaverse by leveraging web3 technology. Founded by notable executives from PC, Console, Mobile, VR, Esports, Crypto, & Animated film, who are partnering with creative rising stars to publish the world's most compelling games and entertainment
...
Purpose & Scope:
Ex Populus is striving to bring joy to people around the globe with the world’s most compelling games and entertainment at the highest level possible. We are determined to work with the next generation of elite content creators and enable their vision by bringing them into a world class studio with some of the industry's most elite talent.

What You’ll Do:
• Design, maintain and deploy smart contracts for video games and the Ex Populus game marketplace.
• Focus on security and best practices for contract development
• Configure and deploy nodes in a network
• Maintain stored and processed data on the blockchain Develop higher-level APIs on top of blockchain primitives
• Manage implications of data on the blockchain and associate costs due to complications Staying current with the latest blockchain developments

What You’ll Need:
• 2-3 years of Software Development experience
• 1+ years of Solidity experience
• Experience designing and developing for large, horizontally scalable, high-transaction volume systems
• Excellent problem solving and intuitive debugging skills
• Knowledge of ethers.js
• Experience working in gaming (a plus)
• Hard Hat experience (Optional)

The company is founded by industry veterans that have collectively received 3 Oscar nominations, 12 Emmy nominations and 7 Annie noms. The staff comes from companies like Ubisoft, Blizzard, Activision, Love Death & Robots, Pixar, Illumination, Wargaming and others. We look forward to speaking with you

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: 2-3 years of Software Development experience
1+ years of Solidity experience
Experience designing and developing for large, horizontally scalable, high-transaction volume systems
Excellent problem solving and intuitive debugging skills
Knowledge of ethers.js
Hard Hat experience (Optional)

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Engineer
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Blockchain Engineer to join our team and help us design, develop, and implement blockchain-based solutions. As a Blockchain Engineer, you will be responsible for developing smart contracts, designing and implementing blockchain protocols, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The project will be cutting edge and unique to the crypto industry... with exposure to the DeFi space. There will be massive opportunities to learn new technologies and skillsets, as well as the chance to develop, test, and maintain code for our mission-critical products.

Our culture is all about diversity, communication, collaboration and education.

Responsibilities and Scope:
• Design, develop and implement blockchain solutions and smart contracts.
• Writing and delivering quality code.
• Interpret product requirements and provide engineering estimates.
• Create and maintain documentation for all blockchain-related processes, procedures, and guidelines.
• Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality and security.
• Troubleshoot and debug blockchain-based applications and systems.
• Work with stakeholders to identify opportunities to leverage blockchain technology to improve business processes.
• Research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in blockchain technology.

What You Will Need To Be Great In This Role:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
• A professional understanding of the Ethereum Virtual Machine and its Yellow Paper
• Fluency in Solidity, Typescript, and NodeJS
• Experience with web3 related libraries and API design
• A high level understanding of common cryptographic and smart contract related vulnerabilities
• Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills and/or experience with reverse engineering
• Proficiency with Git
• Must be passionate about working with a growing team in an office environment
• Great written communication skills
• Efficiency in Rust, a plus
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and meet tight deadlines

Our Stack:
• EVM Blockchain networks
• Hardhat and Foundry
• AWS infrastructure

Preferred:
• Experience with decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and applications.
• Contributions to open-source blockchain projects.
• Experience with Solana is a plus.

This role is based in New York City and will be expected to work from our New York office in a hybrid model Monday - Wednesday.

(NYC only) Pursuant to Section 8-102 of title 8 of the New York City administrative code, the base salary range for this role is $170,000.00 - $190,000.00. Total compensation packages are based on a wide array of factors unique to each candidate, including but not limited to skill set, years & depth of experience, certifications and specific office location. This may differ in other locations due to cost of labor considerations

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Course Instructor
jobs_results.description:
Are you a blockchain, cryptocurrency, NFT, Metaverse, DeFI or Web 3 expert looking to share your knowledge and insights with others?

If so, Blockchain Institute of Technology (BIT) is seeking experienced instructors like you to create courses on emerging blockchain technologies...

As a blockchain course instructor at Blockchain Institute of Technology, you'll have the opportunity to shape and expand our learning resources while empowering discussions and encouraging further blockchain education and research.

Our expert technical team will provide the support needed to help you create amazing courses and engage learners with innovative learning resources such as engaging video lectures, course presentations, and demos.

As a BIT course instructor, you'll:
• Develop new courses on blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 with organized learning resources
• Stay up-to-date with new trends in blockchain and related technologies and incorporate them into your learning materials
• Participate in discussions about blockchain technology
• Collaborate with our technical team to optimize all aspects of your courses for a better learning experience
• Manage the content of your courses and update them regularly with new information

To be considered for this role, you must have:
• 3+ years of experience in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 technologies with over 3 years of professional or industry expertise
• A passion for the field of blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, Metaverse, and Web 3
• A commitment to promoting blockchain education and research

About Blockchain Institute of Technology (BIT)

Blockchain Institute of Technology is the World Standard for Blockchain Education and Certification. ™

Our courses and certifications cover new grounds in blockchain and related technologies, and are designed to empower the blockchain workforce. Join our team and be a part of our mission to change the world... one blockchain at a time

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: 3+ years of experience in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 technologies with over 3 years of professional or industry expertise
A passion for the field of blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, Metaverse, and Web 3
A commitment to promoting blockchain education and research

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: Our expert technical team will provide the support needed to help you create amazing courses and engage learners with innovative learning resources such as engaging video lectures, course presentations, and demos
Develop new courses on blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 with organized learning resources

Participate in discussions about blockchain technology

jobs_results.title: Blockchain DevOps Engineer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
About Telnyx

At Telnyx, we’re architecting and amplifying access to global connectivity. We power communications, wireless, networking and storage from our private, global, multi-cloud IP network all the way out to the hyperlocal edge. And we make this edge infrastructure easily available through intuitive APIs housed in one space...

We’re interested in solving real-world problems, modernizing the antiquated and automating the manual. In building solutions that make connectivity simple and accessible, we’re laying the foundation for a future of endless innovation and interconnected technology. Our shared vision is a future where people, devices and applications can seamlessly connect across the globe.
About You:

You are a highly motivated and experienced Blockchain DevOps Engineer that will be a critical member responsible for overseeing the development and maintenance of our 6+ active FIL miners on an application and systems level.

The Opportunity:

To build a best-in-class Filecoin (FIL) Mining operation. You will be working on projects related to monitoring, alerting, deal making, and smart contracts. You will also be assisting Telnyx with deploying brand new miners in a couple of sites across the US.

You Will be Responsible For:

• Ensure the reliability, availability, and scalability of Telnyx’s Filecoin mining infrastructure
• Analyze system performance data to identify areas for optimization and improvement
• Work closely with other engineers and leaders to specify and develop new tools for monitoring, data ingestion, client engagement, split workloads, and more
• Test new experimental features released by the Protocol Labs team to explore new product opportunities with our mining infrastructure
• Troubleshoot and resolve any issues with our mining applications and systems

Who We're Looking For:

• Bachelors or greater, preferably in Computer Science or other engineering discipline
• Experience working with blockchain technology and distributed systems. Experience with Filecoin preferred
• Have a strong programming background in one (or more) of the following languages: Go, Rust, Javascript
• Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform
• Strong general networking knowledge (DNS, TCP/IP, HTTP, load balancing, QoS)

Bonus Points For:

• Major interest and expertise in Distributed Systems design, development, optimization and operation

#LI-REMOTE#LI-KG1

Bring Your Authentic Self to Telnyx

Telnyx is committed to building a team full of diverse perspectives, various backgrounds and different minds. We believe diversity drives innovation. We are committed to building a culture where difference is valued and creating avenues of equity for underserved groups. While we are still a work in progress, we are actively seeking folks who are passionate about building a place of belonging for everyone.

We're looking for people with passion, grit, and integrity. We believe in transparency, proactivity, and mutual respect. We provide the high-grade tools that help you do your best work, and keep up the collaborative habits that help everyone stay in the loop. No matter where you're based or which team you’re on, you’re plugged in, supported, and helping to shape the future of communications.

You're encouraged to apply even if your experience doesn't precisely match the job description. Your skills and passion will stand out—and set you apart—especially if your career has taken some extraordinary twists and turns. At Telnyx, we welcome diverse perspectives, rigorous thinkers and assumption challengers. Are you ready to join us

Bachelors or greater, preferably in Computer Science or other engineering discipline

Major interest and expertise in Distributed Systems design, development, optimization and operation

jobs_results.title: Ethereum Developer Remote US (Blockchain-DeFi)
jobs_results.description:
Our client is on crypto’s cutting edge technology, and we’re looking for the right engineers to join them. This is a remote position for any US candidate.

Our client's Blockchain Distribution Network (BDN) allows DeFi (Decentralized Finance) traders to make better trades by being better connected. The key difference is that in the decentralized world of DeFi, you need to be connected to... everyone.

We’re looking for the right people to join us in building the missing piece in DeFi infrastructure.

Responsibilities

As a member of an agile engineering team, you will help design, implement, test and deploy new features in very short cycles to an always-on critical-path infrastructure.

Requirements

Qualifications
• 5+ years of development experience
• Experience developing Ethereum solutions
• Experience running ETH nodes
• Experience working with Ethereum transactions
• Golang experience – big advantage
• Experience in a Linux working environment
• Creative, independent, and hardworking
• Team player with great interpersonal communication skills

Great compensation package.

If you think you fit the role please apply to join the blockchain journey

Experience developing Ethereum solutions
Experience running ETH nodes
Experience working with Ethereum transactions
Golang experience – big advantage
Experience in a Linux working environment
Creative, independent, and hardworking
Team player with great interpersonal communication skills

jobs_results.title: Social Media Marketing (Blockchain/Crypto)
jobs_results.description:
• Maintain a social media calendar
• Build Bitquery Brand Awareness through our Social Media channels
• Put our Bitquery updates and educational content on social Media...
• Create reports on social media engagements, coversions
• Creating Social Media Collateral like images, videos (Our Design team will help)
• Monitor narratives and trends and create content
• Organise Twitter Spaces and other virtual Meet-ups

Requirements
• English Proficiency (Written and Speaking) with Grammar skills
• Good understanding of Social media network and related tools (Scheduling, calender)
• Awesome writing skills
• Very active on Twitter (Must need)
• Ability to research and understand complex topic
• Computer Science backgound (Must have)
• Proven track record of building a web3 community
• Good understanding for blockchain concepts (Must have)

Benefits
• Opportunity to work & collaborate with a truly global team spread across 5 countries
• Work from anywhere in the world
• Choose your own work hours
• Yearly trip with Bitquery team to any remote destination
• A promise to finish the interview processes within 1-2 weeks

Being a startup we take decisions & move fairly fast, while giving candidates great experience with the interview process. We have a flat hierarchy in the organization where we empower individuals and provide an opportunity to deliver results as per his/her working style. Come and join a great culture and build Bitquery with us.

Bitquery focuses on Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, and Blockchain / Cryptocurrency. Their company has offices in New York City. They have a small team that's between 11-50 employees.

You can view their website at https://bitquery.io or find them on Twitter and LinkedIn

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer - Blockchain Network (100% Remote)
jobs_results.description:
competitive salaries, stock options, company paid healthcare benefits, 401k, unlimited PTO, remote work and more!

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Karyn Spies...
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.
Salary: $150,000 - $200,000 per year

A bit about us:

A leader in mempool services, block streaming and anything Defi performance. Our client's DeFi trading tools allow users to win at crypto trading by propagating blockchain transactions and blocks closer to the speed of light and provides traders with the speed and reliability required for crypto transactions.

Why join us?

Join a highly skilled team of business and engineering minds who are working on complex and innovative projects. Our client offers competitive salaries, stock options, company paid healthcare benefits, 401k, unlimited PTO, remote work option and more.
• Employee medical, dental and vision insurance with 100% premium coverage.
• Unlimited paid time off.
• Annual trip to celebrate the company's anniversary.
• Quarterly team outings and regular happy hours to recharge and reconnect.

And if you choose to work in the office in Chicago ...
• Onsite yoga classes.
• Unlimited beverages and snacks, including cold-brew and green tea on tap.
• Rotating breakfast menu served daily.
• Dinner if you work past 6pm.
• Thursday happy hours with beer, wine, and charcuterie.

Job Details

Requirements
• At least 5 years of experience with designing, building, testing and implementing highly scalable and distributed backend systems
• 3+ years experience in Blockchain
• 2+ years experience in Blockchain propagation, consensus (one of the following networks: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and Solana)
• Expertise using Go language
• Ability to read, modify blockchain core code (geth, bor, prysm, ...)

Responsibilities
• Improve (suggest and implement) the speed of the network based on the blockchain protocol, network and consensus model
• Create offerings that leverage the speed of the data that passes through the blockchain distribution network
• Integrate our core systems with other blockchains such as Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, Solana and other future blockchains on the roadmap

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button

jobs_results.title: DeFi Blockchain Co-Founder
jobs_results.description:
Cryptops is currently looking for a Co-Founder / Chief Executive Officer to help launch a unique innovative DeFi exchange for crypto currency option derivatives using an on blockchain order book.

The Cryptops Exchange uses asset tokenization to provide an intuitive, secure and censorship resistant method for trading crypto currency option derivatives directly on blockchain. Cryptops is currently... the only decentralized exchange that uses asset tokenization to issue traditional financial derivatives directly to an on-blockchain order book.

Other decentralized derivatives exchanges require users to install web browser plugins in order to "connect" to a hybrid off-chain order book to place orders and make trades. This insecure method causes users to constantly lose millions in various "hacks", "exploits" and "vulnerabilities". These problems are solved using Cryptops where trades happen directly on the verifiable blockchain order book with transactions closing on average in under 5 seconds.

Some unique benefits of the Cryptops project.
• The most censorship resistant cryptocurrency derivatives DEX available.
• The most secure and convenient staking model that does not involve any kind of obscure lending practices or lockups.
• The asset token derivatives are exercisable to tokens that are pegged in value and directly transferable to real world native coins on their blockchains.

For further information, please visit the Cryptops website at: cryptops.exchange

Responsibilities

Raising capital, team building, and scaling the project.

Providing overall strategic direction and take part in decisions on how to best advance the project such as to list the COE coin to centralized exchanges.

Possessing strong understanding of the current DeFi market solutions and limitations.

Developing and executing a plan to ensure the launch and growth of the Cryptops project. This will include leading fundraising efforts and managing relationships with investors.

Qualifications

Can personally invest or immediately support an initial capital raise of $500,000 in return for a 10% ownership share of the Cryptops project.

Entrepreneur interested in introducing an innovative DeFi platform that uses a direct access blockchain order book.

Able to perform a seed funding of round of $300k to $3 million that will be used to get the project production ready and provide the proof of asset reserves that will be displayed by the public facing dashboard.

Deep network of investors, technologist and blockchain enthusiasts

job_highlights.title: Qualifications

Able to perform a seed funding of round of $300k to $3 million that will be used to get the project production ready and provide the proof of asset reserves that will be displayed by the public facing dashboard
